concept.title: RSA NetWitness Platform 11.x Troubleshooting
concept.shortdesc: This provides an overview of the different type of issues that users often run into often in RSA NetWitness Platform version 11.x.

conbody.p: Users can often run into issues for licensing and dashboards within the RSA NetWitness Platform 11.x. License issues can be caused by the capture button within the System page of a service being disabled. Dashboard issues can be caused by multiple unintended "Default" dashboards.
The following table provides links to the various issues and the topics that they fall into.

entry.xref: Start/Stop Capture button is disabled on the Decoder service in RSA NetWitness Platform version 11.3.x
Delete Duplicate "Default Dashboards" in RSA NetWitness Platform versions 10.6.x and 11.x
